Title: Fixer
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Cavell, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylen comes to the aid of a bookie informant, who has been kidnapped by one of his collectors and one of his delinquent clients.
